title: Sponge的领地插件玩家无法与mod仪器互动
author: ww龙mc
txt_content:
权限已经给到中等了 还是无法与mod仪器互动
插件 GriefPrevention

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
指令就是/claimflag [<flag> <source> <target> <value> [context] | <target> <value> [context]] 
具体怎么使用可以参考 
https://github.com/MinecraftPort ... ntion/wiki/Pixelmon

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
https://github.com/MinecraftPort ... arget-value-context
直接给需要交互的方块的权限呢
